data.text:
We stayed here for 3 nights at the end of March as a family of 4. We had a family room booked but they kindly upgraded us at checkin as it was for my 50th birthday celebration, which was really nice! Amazing room, we had 3 bedrooms and loads of space, everything you need to self cater for a few days. Spotlessly clean with some decent views through the hotels opposite to the sea. Staff were friendly and helpful, cant fault them. Handily has a supermarket on the ground floor which was a godsend for essentials, although plenty of water was provided for us. 
Location was great for getting cabs along to the palm, although it was a little further out for visiting the Burj Al Khalifa area (thankfully cabs are cheap but its about 35 mins drive). Lots of restaurants along the road outside the hotel, and also the beach is a 5 minute walk across the road by the Hilton Hotel.
The only niggle I had was the breakfast. The food wasn't as good or as plentiful as I thought it would be, and they only had one coffee machine for all of the people that were staying there. I gave up queuing due to the wait time. They need at least one more machine, or have a table service offering this and have staff making them. 
Other than this slight niggle, was really happy with this place and would definitely stay here again.
data.title: Great location, Amazing room, breakfast a let down

data.text: Wow I had great view from the apt that we have stayed, indeed it was super nice spotless cleaned room well presented, the housekeeping team was excellent with nice touch and great cleaning services amazing will always come back at Blue beach tower.
data.title: Super amazing

data.text:
The experience was very good overall. The view was stunning, and it has a very good proximity to restaurants and shops. The staff was extremely kind, from the front desk being attended by Maria and Runia, to the people helping with room service. 
Overall I recommend this place
data.title: Blue beach tower

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Kzheng, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. 

We are thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful experience during your recent stay with us. In Blue Beach Tower, we strive to provide all our guests with exceptional service, and it is always a pleasure to hear when we have succeeded in doing so. Your kind words about Location and facilities, have been passed along to the team and they are truly appreciative of your feedback. We are delighted to have been a part of your memorable experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. 

Thank you for choosing Blue Beach Tower. 

Best regards,

 Blue Beach Tower Management.
owner_response.author: Blue Beach Tower

data.text: We stayed here in mid Dec 2016 with two families in a four bedroom apartment, four adults and four children. We were really surprised at how spacious and well appointed the apartment was, it had everything we needed and more. The location was perfect for us it is situated on with walking distance to Dubai Marina
data.title: Excellent!!

data.text:
I tried ti speak with the manager but they never came. We are staying in the premium apartment with sea view for 16 nights. 
Firstly, they don’t clean room every day, or they come after 6 in the evening telling they were to busy. 
Then they close the pool for 5 days for reconstruction.
And tonight they just informed us there is no water in the hotel… 
When I asked when it will come they told us first at 7, then at 3 in the morning. 
Imagine having one year old baby in the apartment without water all day, all salty and in the needs for changing every 3 hours, washing, cooking, cleaning…
When I complained they send us to shower baby in the apartment on 4th floor with NO HOT WATER! 
Imagine showering baby with cold water… 
When I complained they said they will send engineer who never came! 
Worst experience ever!
data.title: No water in the apartment

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Skarlet, 

Greetings from Blue Beach Tower.

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused during your recent stay. We value constructive criticism and take all guest feedback seriously as we continually strive to enhance our services.

Regarding the water closure, it was mandatory maintenance as per MTDCC policy. We endeavored to resolve it within three days to ensure uninterrupted water supply for our guests. Additionally, we attempted to accommodate affected guests by offering alternative rooms, upgrading many to higher floors and premium options where water services were not interrupted.

Our room service team cleans rooms daily, respecting the "Do Not Disturb" signs to avoid inconveniencing our guests.

We apologize once again for any inconvenience and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience in the future. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.

Best regards,
Blue Beach Tower Management
owner_response.author: Blue Beach Tower
